subject: Backend Update Required for Harmony Junction (calendar-be)
body:
Harmony Junction frontend has been updated with barbershop organizer types.

BACKEND CHANGE NEEDED:
- File: models/organizers.js
- Change: Added barbershop organizerTypes (isChorus, isQuartet, isChorusCoach, isQuartetCoach, isJudge, isVocalTeacher, isRegionalAdmin)
- Status: Modified but NOT committed
- Risk: LOW - extends schema, preserves all tango types

ACTION REQUIRED:
cd ../calendar-be
git add models/organizers.js
git commit -m 'Add barbershop organizer types for appId=2'
git push origin <branch>

Without this change, new barbershop organizer types won't persist in MongoDB.

Frontend changes pushed to: harmonyjunction.org DEVL branch
